packages.name: synology-monitor
packages.description: EasySystems GmbH Kuma Monitor Addon for Synology DSM with SMART, storage, backup, ping, port, DNS checks, guided elevated-access setup, diagnostics views, per-monitor actions, multi-instance peering with mTLS security, and Uptime Kuma push integration. Proxy: Control Panel > Login Portal > Application. Add rule Source (FQDN/hostname) -> Destination http://localhost:8787 for HTTPS browser access. Do NOT use the proxy FQDN for peering (Master URL, Agent Callback URL); use internal hostname or IP:8787 so agents and master connect directly.
